title: Who is the father of C language?
Which of the following is not a valid C variable name?
All keywords in C are in ____________
Which of the following is true for variable names in C?
answer_1: They can contain alphanumeric characters as well as special characters
answer_2: It is not an error to declare a variable to be one of the keywords(like goto, static)
answer_3: Variable names cannot start with a digit
answer_4: Variable can be of any length
right_answer: Variable names cannot start with a digit

title: Which of the following cannot be a variable name in C?
What is short int in C programming?
answer_1: The basic data type of C
answer_3: Short is the qualifier and int is the basic data type
right_answer: Short is the qualifier and int is the basic data type

title: Which of the following declaration is not supported by C language?
Which keyword is used to prevent any changes in the variable within a C program?
What is the result of logical or relational expression in C?
answer_3: 0 if an expression is false and any positive number if an expression is true
